channel.title: Tree Height on
channel.description: Recent content in Tree Height on

item.title: Tree measurements on the Rockefeller Center Christmas Tree
item.description: The Rockefeller Center Christmas Tree in 2022. One of my favorite things about the holiday season is the Rockefeller Christmas tree. Every year the Christmas tree at Rockefeller Center in New York City brings a wonderful burst of green amid the dull winter colors of a big city. Although I don’t live in New York, it’s fun to watch the tree lighting special on NBC and see it pop into some of my favorite holiday movies like Elf.

item.title: Lorey's height: the remote sensing way to estimate tree height
item.description: A canopy of lowland conifer trees in northern Minnesota. One of the first things you learn in an forestry field course is how to measure the height of trees. Doing so is tricky, as it’s difficult to locate the tops of many trees in dense forests (especially deciduous ones during leaf-on periods). Many foresters will sub-sample tree heights, for example only measuring the heights for every fifth tree or the four closest trees to plot center.
